website_summaries.verdict: A great choice if you’re in search of an indoors-only basic fog machine with lights.
pros: Wireless remote has a range of 50 m. Decent price
Takes about 4 minutes to warm up

customer_reviews.title: It's an excellent fog machine for the price...
customer_reviews.text: I love the amount of fog it sprays... The lights are a nice addition, but would definitely be a ton better if they changed colors or had some type or cycle or patterns... The wireless controller is convenient, but you have to use either or, again would be even better if you could use or plug both in for multiple users or what not... Other than that I would purchase one, but think I'll probably spend a few bucks more for the basic features I want that this one doesn't have...
customer_reviews.author: Cecil Pena

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: For a lower end machine, this seems to work perfectly. I like the wireless remote provided, which I’ll be using for Halloween. It puts out a good amount of fog in a short time and reheats quickly. My only complaint is the 3 lights on the front stay on, so I’ll have to cover them. Otherwise, great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: richard herner

customer_reviews.title: Really research this before buying, there are better--safer
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: There is no continuous fog feature, as they say "yes" if you search the questions, AND, you cannot turn the LEDS OFF/ON, they just come on, as again, they say "yes" you can turn off, if you search the questions. They do not specify safety features such a temperature sensor inside the machine for overheat, to automatically power off, or fuse. I bought this in haste for Halloween, my child. Works good, lights are good--bright, but there are better. I don't like the fact the they flat-out lie on just the two points alone above. KEEP SEARCHING.
customer_reviews.author: Napkin, Calif

customer_reviews.title: Value For Money
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS THANG! i bought one for Like My room and stuff at first One Came and It dint work so i got a replacement and boom! Amazed! Shoots out lots of smoke AND IT BARELY WASTES liquid !
customer_reviews.author: JackieMay

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Tested at home and it looks pretty nice! Will be using it at my parties soon.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Remote Control....AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the machine for a grill cake I made. Exactly what I ordered! No issues and fast delivery. Worked perfectly!! The remote control was AWESOME!! The colors helped as well. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: ERIKA FOY

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used this for Halloween. Great smoke volume- did not have to wait very long before able to create more fog- lasted all night
customer_reviews.author: Papa D

customer_reviews.title: Great fog machine.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic machine for price! Lots of fog and wireless remote!!!
customer_reviews.author: SKS

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at how well this thing performs at minimal wattage. No leaks and a quick recovery time. Puts out twice the amount of fog as my other, slightly larger, machines.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rke

customer_reviews.title: Does its job, but no color changing
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the description, but apparently the lights on the front don't change and there is no way to turn them off. While I'm ok with the blue/purple light emitting from the front, it would have been nice to be able to change it for different moods. Other than that the wireless remote that came with it doesn't work, but the plugin remote works. I just really wish I had purchased a different fog machine. It does its job, but for the price I could have had the features I wanted with another vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Confirmed Purchase

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for our outdoor Halloween party! The remote feature is key!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent LED fogger.
customer_reviews.text: Produces a good amount of smoke pretty quickly. The remote worked through a wall. Only complaint is that the reheat time was the same whether you fogged for a few seconds or for the full time. Note: The lights on the front are always on when the machine is turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Tadeo

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful addition to our Halloween display. Lights added good atmosphere. Remote is nice so I could make fog as trick or treaters walked up. Had lots of fluid left at the end of the night
customer_reviews.author: Tealtownfan

customer_reviews.title: they work..
customer_reviews.text: they work.. I haven't used them very much because I bought them for next year, The lights don't contribute much to the effect. They put out a decent amount of fog but have to cycle after initial heat up.
customer_reviews.author: jimmi

customer_reviews.title: Wrong name. It is a Mini-fog Machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a “mini-fog” machine. It does not state that in the details.
customer_reviews.author: Taren

customer_reviews.title: Good enough bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a pretty good machine. The put out is fairly decent but will need something to cool it’s output if you want low lying smoke. The lights on the front are nice but you can’t select which light you want as they all three stay continuously. Keep from children as the unit can get very hot. But again for the cost it’s pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Green

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price point would buy again if needed or recommended
customer_reviews.text: No issues at all did the job better than expected for Halloween. I used a high density fog formula and used it for about 2 hrs straight with only one refill. Remote control has about a 10 ft. radius from machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little smoke machine also has lights!
customer_reviews.text: I am really satisfied with this product, this machine works great considering the size and it doesn't take long to get the smoke out, it also has lights perfect for theater and parties also the amount of smoke is impressive for the size of the machine I used it for many theater shows and it worked great! totally recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca L.

customer_reviews.title: Turn your house into a non visible deluge.
customer_reviews.text: Ran this thing all out for about an hour. Couldn't see anything. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: william carr

customer_reviews.title: Used before
customer_reviews.text: Item was used before with many scratches and damage packaging. Filthy condition
customer_reviews.author: MMTECH

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Literally had to sit and hold the button down to release fog. Then after putting out fog it would have to warm back up for 1-2 minutes before putting out another small amount of fog
customer_reviews.author: Marla F.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Put it up in our music room. Works great, and fun to jam with.
customer_reviews.author: seth hayes

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little machine.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this several times now. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Evie Kalmar

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: I'm really in love with this fog machine, works as expected the remote is an amazing touch!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little fog machine.
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for our haunted hayride. The remote worked for us. That’s all we used. The fog fluid lasted all night in this machine. The only thing I didn’t like is the colorful lights do not shut off.
customer_reviews.author: Ljmarie

customer_reviews.title: Added Great effects
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Kids loved it at the party. Can be hot to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Tenna Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The remote let’s just the right amount of smoke out!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great Fog Maxhine
customer_reviews.text: I use this fog machine onto my car I love this willing to buy more
customer_reviews.author: White Dragon VIP Service

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Only blows for a minute or so then needs a  ̈break ̈ for 10 minutes to blow again. The motion sensor clicker does not work. Cheap for the price.
customer_reviews.author: katie920

customer_reviews.title: Does not work at all.
customer_reviews.text: The directions are written very poorly. I followed them very carefully, yet the machine still did not work. It only let out the tiniest bit of fog and didn’t last long at all. Super bummed I paid for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect for what we need.Husban is more than happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smoke
customer_reviews.text: Small amount of smoke if used in a big room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No automatic setting
customer_reviews.text: Only works when remote is pushed can't set to automatically go off
customer_reviews.author: Dc

customer_reviews.title: works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. fog was very dense and works really good fo our project.
customer_reviews.author: jose c

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money, I like that it has lights and the remote control was fun to use
customer_reviews.author: dayana castillo

customer_reviews.title: Broke before I got done with first tank of Fog Juice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item based on amazon reviews. First couple of uses I was very happy worked great. The machine broke before I even got through the first tank of fog juice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Wish it didn’t require a remote or actually manually pressing the button.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Plugged unit in. Lit up. Then lights went out. Checked all, no issues. Unit appears to be in-op. Ordered replacement. We'll see???
customer_reviews.author: Douglas E Emsley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just got it. It worked great. Not bad for the price. LED lights are a cool addition. No complaints here. Shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: "armyfool"

customer_reviews.title: Neat for parties
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool. Kids love it and it goes with the music
customer_reviews.author: Nathan simpson

customer_reviews.title: It doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get it turned on. They wouldn't let me return it. Such a waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Bought it a month ago for an event this weekend and just trying it out today. Doesn’t work. Wasted money. It won’t heat at all.
customer_reviews.author: M.W.

customer_reviews.title: Good dog machine for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my sons 16th. All the kids loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Lights broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty disappointed first off with the instructions on how much fog juice to water I needed and had to go through online resources to eventually find an answer. I literally bought this one because of the high reviews and was quite disappointed that once I finally turned it on and it heated up the last shorted out. I needed this for an upcoming performance and am quite disappointed I will have to buy another one somewhere else given my deadline.
customer_reviews.author: MountainKat

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed. Limited smoke time after minutes of warming
customer_reviews.text: Technically the unit worked, but it only blows smoke foe 12-18 seconds, then it has to heat up for another 3 mins before it can work. The biggest issue is that the smoke (after the first use) doesn’t blow out the end. Instead it starts coming out of the cooling vents on the unit with only drips coming out of the actual smoke nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: KevCentral

customer_reviews.title: Good value for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: One use so far. Remote range can be spotty but I’m not a pro, and this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Mine doesn’t power on
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for last Halloween and didn’t get to use it. Literally just opened it for this Halloween and it is not powering on. I purchased new fuses for it for four dollars off of Amazon thinking that might be the issue but still not working. And since my return is closed that’s $50 gone. Sad really.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Grimaldi

product_meta.title: Fog Machine GECKO Smoke Machine Hood Portable LED Light With Wired and Wireless Remote Control, Fast Heating, Suitable for Parties, Christmas, Halloween and Wedding
feature_bullets: Fog Machine Control Mode:GECKO fog machine is equipped with Wired and wireless remote control. The effective distance of the wired is 3 meters, for the wireless is 50 meters. Control the machine freely.
Durable Iron Material: iron outer casing for better heat-resistant ensure durability and long lifespan. Equipped with a 250ml tank for long lasting fog production.

RGB Light Design:Combination of the fog and colorful light together, perfect for enhancing atmosphere of live concerts, stage atmosphere, festival, wedding ceremony ,DJ and family entertainment gatherings.

Non-toxic and Energy-Saving: Certified for FCC, CE, FDA and ROSH for safety guarantee. 400w power supply make it produce 1000 CFM((cubic feet per minute) non-toxic fog after few minutes warming up. And the effective fog distance is 1-2m.

Worry-Free Warranty: At GECKO, we believe in our products.,That's why we back them all with an 12-month warranty and 30 Days Unconditional Money Back Guarantee provide friendly, easy-to-reach support.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars171 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
